title: My Dog was invited by The Governor of Japan (Gunma)

comments.comment:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJYMhzM8_aU
Gunma-chan relived our vlog
Let’s all take a moment to appreciate Edgar and Maya for bringing Felix and Marzia with them.
Marzia's videography style romanticizes every small detail. Love it. It's art.

I know Felix won’t see this but I wanna say that I’ve been watching since 2012. Seeing what you have accomplished and where you’re at in your life. You (Felix) inspired me to just do what I love instead of something safe. I’m now 22 and a pilot .. tomorrow is my first ever flight as left seat and I like to believe i wouldn’t be here if it wasn’t for the inspiration you gave me and give so many people. Goodluck with the rest of your life
群馬を取り上げてくれるなんてありがとう！！！心から感謝します！！！群馬県出身の日本人です。
So proud of Edgar, after all his hard work, sweat and tears he’s finally getting the recognition he deserves! Felix and Marzia are so lucky to have a dog like Edgar. Truly inspiring.
I am a Japanese living in Gunma Prefecture, Japan. I never dreamed the day would come when a legendary YouTuber would introduce my hometown. I will continue to support you in the future
Pewd's humor, Marzia's editing, the scenery. It's just perfect, thank you for taking us along.
Rest in Peace, Maya. Even the most stoic samurai would shed a tear.
Pewds already did his thing on YT and now he's just enjoying his life and sharing some pieces with us, makes me so happy for them
It's crazy how Felix and Marzia has gone so far. Even their pets are getting well-recognized!
Marzia does an amazing job with the editing and B roll and stuff on these vids. Really captures the aesthetic of the places you visit. I love it.
The sword maker and his family is so nice, its so touching to see them waving while you are driving away.
It’s so amazing to see Felix and Marzia live their best life.
Marzia’s filming & editing is always so peaceful & thoughtful. They could be in a moshpit at a slipknot concert in a hurricane & it would still be so relaxing to watch, I swear. She’s got skills.

Every single one of these vlogs are such a joy to watch. This is the most at peace I've ever seen Pewds and I've been a viewer for around +-10 years.
You can't help but feel so happy for him and his family.

The internet has made thousands of terrible and talentless people rich, but Pewdiepie has always been a cool dude. I think it's his rational mind combined with good humor, a rare and refreshing combination. Glad to see him so happy and whole with his loved ones <3

It is somewhat emotional watching these vlogs because I feel like he is finally at peace and enjoying what he does. I've seen Felix grow and moments in which he looked so tired. But now he finally found the place to be and seeing him shine and explore so much makes my day even more brighter.
Truly incredible the impact that Felix has had on the world. To the point where his dog is recognized by a Japanese governor.
The fact that Edgar was the one who was invited but he ended up in the cage the whole time is just so funny

I'm actually really proud you made a sword, sword culture is dying in Japan and when I saw that you made a well what looked like a tantō it looked very nice. I'd wish there were more people to appreciate and might even be an apprentice. Thank you so much.
It kinda makes me emotional seeing Felix and Marzia live out their dream and sharing it with us. Thank you for bringing us on this journey.
I love how marzia films and edits these videos there so lovely to watch
im liking the "retired" pewdiepie videos. i love watching felix and marzia live their best lives that they deserves.
Rest in peace Maya I'm sure you'll be waiting for pewds marzias and Edgar like a good girl.

Japanese here, your Nihongo(obligatory 日本語上手ですね) has really improved! You're starting to nail the pronunciation of the words and the accent, I swear that there are parts in this video where you could be mistaken as a Japanese person. Good job Felix, can't even imagine how hard it was for you to reach your current level, it's obvious that you're really serious about it and that makes me happy and proud. Love your videos, keep em coming!
So happy for Pewds, he worked so hard to get to Japan and finally living the life over there

My favorite thing about Felix is how normal he is. I mean the guy is worth millions of dollars, but he still get's excited by a fancy hotel or a neat gadget. There's something so wholesome in how normal he's stayed despite all the fame and money and all that bullshit. 

to me it shows he's a good person, and these vlogs really give us a glimpse in the life of a guy who's given us hours of entertainment over the years. 

i'm glad you're happy dude. Keep doing you.

こんな登録者多いのに誰にも気づかれなさそうなの逆にすごい
この動画なぜか海外から日本観光に来てる気分になる
見え方が新鮮
I think we can all agree, this is the happiest we’ve seen Felix. He seems so genuinely happy and it just fills my heart with joy! ️️
It always impresses me how much Japanese Felix knows. He seems to be getting better every episode!
Damn, he really is living out his dream. Even the sponsored videos are just him and Marzia living their best life.
Let’s all appreciate Marzia for recording all these vlogs ever since they came to Japan

Felix has really lived an extravagant life. Born and raised in Sweden, met his partner from Italy online, then traveled with her to live in England and now Japan. He’s such a genuinely nice person and I am happy that he gets to see the world.

日本語の上達度合いがすごいですね。
漢字も普通に読めて、「おじゃまします」のイントネーションとかも完璧です。
The people of Gunma are blessed to be in the presence of Edgar and Maya.
Governor of Gunma is a very smart person to invite PewDiePie, good marketing
Seeing Pewds, Marzia, Edgar ,and Maya happy in japan just brings joy to my heart.

Random but I absolutely LOVE the shots where Marzia is walking through the pretty scenery! Her outfits are always spot on and it just reminds me of a music video. I think it's just me wanting to live vicariously through her lol, I just love her energy!
Man seeing Felix, Marzia, and the pugs so happy really makes me happy.
R.I.P Maya You Will Always Be In Our Hearts

最近動画を見始めた日本人です！
一緒に旅をしている気持ちになって幸せです！
素敵な映像をありがとうございます
13:02 the way they wave goodbye to felix even when he's far ahead is so freaking cute
Japan loves pets so this is so cute that Edgar and Maya got a special invite. It was nice of them to bring their humans.
It’s so cool to watch someone who completely deserves it living their best life. What a beautiful family.
I just love how welcoming Japan has been to PewDiePie and Marzia....it was worth the wait for them.

But can we take a moment and appreciate how nice, smart and modern it is from the Government to be so welcoming and willing to collaborate with influencers in the best way possible. They actually understand the importance of connecting to the young international audience. Damn.
Felix has become so powerful that even his pets are being so renowned and recognized. This is actually really adorable though.
Man i really miss marzia’s style of vlogs i’m glad we get this
As a blacksmith I am incredibly jealous right now! Its always been a dream of mine to go to Japan and visit a sword smith. I'm so glad you get to experience such awesome things. ^^
It's so freakin adorable how happy Edgar is! It's like he knows how awesome this adventure is! Congrats Felix and Marzia!

Felix is exactly how I wish all people with money were. They don't own lambos or mansions even though they COULD easily. He has a modest place, a tesla and a Toyota. He goes and learns culture like sword making. He's not a showoff and is still a humble guy who remembers working the hot dog cart. He is what I strive to be
見てるだけで笑顔になるし忘れて幸せになれる

it's so nice to see Felix essentially retired and being able to enjoy his new life to the fullest but still filming parts of it and it not effecting his lifestyle in the slightest. it all feels so genuine and comfortable to watch, even down to the presentation of the video having minimal editing it all feels so respectful. ironically you've become my favourite vlog channel, despite me hating vloggers, there's an element of beauty to these videos and yet all you're doing is just enjoying your new relaxing life. thank you for filming parts of it and sharing it with us. I've always wanted to go to Japan and being able to see you enjoy it to your fullest is very fulfilling in of itself from a viewers perspective

I know it's inevitable but hope Maya lives longer. She's very lucky to have Pewds as her owner and vice versa . She's like a mascot of the channel along with Edgar , invaluable and precious. Wish her life was one of fulfillment and happiness.I hope to see more of the dogs in the coming future videos cuz we can't have enough pls.I want to see them as much as I can.️️
That is so cute. It's so surreal that the pugs were invited by the governor.
I lost my pug Laverne last year and it always makes me feel good seeing the love you both share for Edgar & Maya. Love these vlog videos!
So nice of Edgar to bring his pets XD

Felix has made it so far in life from the simple horror games he played to now sharing the rest of his life with his wife and dogs. As I have watched you since I was a kid in 3rd grade to now in college you have helped influence people including myself to push further with my goals. I wish you and your family and friends the best in life.
As an American I am in awe of the creativity and care the residents of Japan put into literally everything. So beautiful! I'm happy for you guys, this looked so fun!
My guy is literally just living his best life now, it almost feels like he is a retired youtuber and is now just enjoying his time, good for him that's the dream right there lol
Felix’s ability to read Japanese is getting so good! I’m proud of him!
As someone who used to watch Pewds in 2012 but hasn't kept up since he stopped playing horror games, I am both pleased and SHOCKED that Edgar is still around. What a lil champ
Japan is the perfect mix of awesome, futuristic cities and interesting, ancient culture and traditions.
After a while, coming back to see how everyone is doing in Felix and Marzia's family is making me emotional. 11 years and you're still making me smile
The more I see this vlogs, and knowing that Marzia edits this videos, the more I realize how talented Marzia is at editing this vlogs. It's very comfy and chill tbh.
Fucking insane how he got recognized by a Japanese governor, good job Edgar. Also thanks Marzia and PewDiePie for raising such a legend.
日本語がめっちゃ上手くなっている！感動！
it sucks being alive but everytime i watch pewds japan  vlogs, it's suddenly feels good to be alive
Pwed’s videos nowadays are a go to when you’re depressed or tired.

I’ve honestly learned so much about Japan from your videos.  Not the geography or history, but the details of daily life that you don’t find in books.  It’s cool to see Edgar get some recognition for his work.  Thanks!
But can we talk about how wholesome it is from the Governor to write a letter to a pug and invite them all?Lol
Gunma honestly looks so pretty, when Japan opens up I would love to go visit this place for the first time.
I’m loving Pewds filming style. Sone of his shots are pure art. These vlogs are so calming and feel-good. I hope he keeps making them forever
Marzia is sooo good at filming it looks amazing, super chill as always i love the calm video style:)

I never really interact on YouTube, but I just want to say a big thank you to you guys. It's always been my wife and I's dream to visit Japan, but we've never had the opportunity. 

Watching your Japan videos where you capture the culture, and really explore and enjoy the little things (as well as all the really cool stuff) has really made us feel like we're there and sharing in your experiences. To do this so powerfully over such a medium is an amazing feat, you guys are an amazing team. Congratulations on finding your little slice of heaven. 

Absolutely, hands-down my most anticipated content every week - keep doing what you love for as long as it brings you guys the happiness that radiates from these videos guys.

Thanks again,
All the best.
You and Marzia did a super good job at documenting the experience. The music and editing were on point too. Much love!

I just wanna say Pewds I grew up watching you for the past 10 years of my life, I was 9 when I started and now I am 20! I just want to thank you for the content you put out, it has kept me so happy for the past 10 years! you and marzia are such beautiful and kind people and have been my role models for such a long time, you guys are awesome! keep up the incredible content!
I just cannot stop appreciating the editing so so so much. Like I really feel the sense of enjoyment and relaxation of each vlog. And the music Marzia chooses always fits the scene.

どんどん日本語上手くなっててすごい！
群馬のどかでいいですね〜行ってみたくなりました
4:33 That guy is living my dream. Being in the same frame with all time favorite youtuber in the world.
I love LOVE your new content since the move. You've actually become quite a filmographer.  I'm happy to see you, Marzia and the doggos living the life you dreamt of  thank you for bringing us along.
That swordmaking part was absolutely brilliant. What an amazing vibe, of the video editing and the whole experience itself I can imagine.

Their vlogs have seriously become my go to comfort videos, the music and the editing and just watching them live their life to the fullest makes me feel so warm and safe inside. Makes me want to appreciate the little things and enjoy my life myself :))

One of my most favourite PewDiePie videos ever. It's so beautifully captured and edited.

Loving the Japan vlogs!!

Welcome to my home town!
Even though it was a direct invitation from the prefecture, I never thought that you would come to Gunma (I think it is by far less well-known than Tokyo for foreigners...).
In addition to Kusatsu Onsen, there are many other famous hot springs such as Ikaho Onsen, Shima Onsen and Kawaba Onsen, so I hope you will have the chance to visit us again!
Pewds’ Japanese reading keeps getting better and better! I remember how it was when he first went to Japan, and he’s improved so much. It inspires me to continue studying Japanese
In one of the most horrible times of my life, this was just the wholesome smile inducing video I needed
Thanks for the beautiful video. The B-roll was incredible.

Brilliant gesture by Edgar to allow his parents to accompany him in this beautiful journey to Gunma.. The video was so beautiful in so many ways, Pewds living life in 🇯🇵, and Marzia being his partner and this couple is so wholesome.. Gunma is such a beautiful and lovely place with so many KIND ppl.. went there and thoroughly enjoyed my stay, 10/10 would recommend..  
Love Japan and Love this journey..

I love how smart Gunma is, knowing that the Japan is opening up VERY soon they went with the best youtuber in the world, Edgar, to hopefully convince us to travel to their city. Tbh it was already on my list for next year.
Making that knife was really so awesome! I’m sure Felix had a wonderful experience. He’s so respectful of the process.

Welcome to Gunma!
I'm glad that you and your family came to my favorite hometown.
I never enjoyed life vlogs as much as these. They music, the editing, the atmosphere just absolutely puts my mind at ease.

Felix x Marzia vlogs will always be my happy place! started with the honeymoon vlog with this beautiful music and chilly vibes i‘ve watched this video everytime i needed to take a break and just enjoy seeing you live life so i can forget everything else for half an hour and now i can have this on a weekly basis, thank you so much felix and marzia for showing me how i want to be loved, btw Marzia‘s doing a great job editing i love her style

So weird. Living my life. Registering pewds as someone I knew when I was 9. Not really keeping up with him. But over the years checking in to see what he's up to. Knew he moved to japan. Watched his vids visiting. But now it feels like he's finally settled. Next I see him might be with a kid or two. It's insane what I've witnessed in my life.
I'm so glad you introduced Gunma, and I watched this channel for the first time, from Japan

These vlogs are probably the best I've ever watched. The shots are so aesthetically pleasing it gives me warmth and relaxation. Top notch editing, Marzia is so so talented. I love both of you guys and the pugs so much.

I'm so glad you like living in Japan!  I am also came back from US to Japan.  I can appreciate everything living in Japan.  So safe, reasonable medical insurance, good transportation, hospitality (Omotenashi), good food!
Lmao the way Edgar scoffed down that pastry, they gave him lol that was so cute
The sword making part..  how incredibly beautiful.
The editing style of this video is a masterpiece. You guys really make us feel as if we are there with u. So happy for you guys!

I just have to say these Japan videos make me feel like i am in a really good dream its awesome to grow up along side this channel and see all their hard work paying off now just being themselves and doing what makes them happy

Having spent the last few months in 6 different places in Japan for work, this content is very nice because it reminds me of what I will be missing when I go back to Sweden in 2 days. Glad to see you guys happy and relaxed
People who move to Japan really have my respect, you move all the way there and leaned a new language with a new alphabet essentially for culture and esthetics.
This was so wonderfly made. The music especially. Tugs at the heartstrings. I've never met either of you Felix and Marzia but thank you for bring us joy!
This was so peaceful, I wanted to cry!  I love seeing Felix being his fun goofy self with Marzia.  This makes me so happy.  Gunma is definitely on my bucket list now!
This dog has achieved more in live than I ever will
thank you for this vlog! Never been to japan before but felt like I've already been in Japan. Amazing
seeing pewdiepie living his best life after all these years of hard work makes me bit emotional. THANK YOU felix for everything!

These videos bring me a form of comfort and peace I don't find in myself often. I'm just so relaxed and enjoying the 'moments' you guys have because seeing you enjoy life is somehow so satisfying. I've commented it before, but truly thank you for taking us along! It's so much fun
These recent videos have been wholesome and wonderful. Glad to see you all enjoying your life in Japan.
This was such a cute video. I love how Edgar was spoiled on the trip. I'm glad he was able to go.

This is honestly better than most travel blogs, it's so charming and natural and good to watch. It makes me so happy to see Pewds and Merthz happy as well, wishing the best for them, feels like I grew up with them.

This whole video warmed my heart. 
The way Pewds and Marzia are so respectful towards Japanese culture is so humble, sweet and inspiring. :')

Seeing the swordsmiths forging swords/knives in traditional Japanese clothing around 11:50 was so cool! I instantly thought of InuYasha haha

Also, Pewds trynna study Japanese at  is me trynna get through college lol

Finally, someone respects Edgar and Maya as they deserve! One of my dogs (the younger one, just about 1,5 yo) just got diagnosed with severe kidney damage, so I feel like this is the type of video I needed to watch to cheer me up. It's nice to see two cute dogs being invited to a cool place like this. They deserve all the love! (A shame that Maya couldn't go, but it's for the best!)
I have a new-found appreciation towards these low key videos Pewdiepie, this is so wholesome, I just smile and enjoy  very different from your usual but I must say, it is a very positive change!
Watching these vlogs really makes me feel how much time has passed ever since I started to watch pewds. It brings a nostalgic tear to my eye while keeping things fresh and new.

I've been watching Pewdiepie since I was a kid. I've never enjoying myself more than now with these Japan vlogs. I can't help but to get emotional every video. its just so tranquil and beautiful. I'm just so happy for you two. I hope to move back to Japan soon.
Edgar was so cute in the start. I love the way he came running after pewds said "eggy!"
